Title: Godhi Banna Sadharana Mykattu
Writer: Hemanth Kumar Lakshmaiah (additional dialogue), Hemanth M. Rao
Actors: Anant Nag, Rakshit Shetty, Sruthi Hariharan, Achyuth Kumar
Plot: The film is about Venkob Rao (Anant Nag), a middle class simpleton ailing with Alzheimer's, who goes missing. His son, Shiva (Rakshit Shetty) is a career driven person, who is forced to ...
